WorkItem.Description:
Currently in the Item editor UI, there isn't any "editable" token field as well as any place to show the Arena/Battleground rating required to purchase. For example:
 
As an example:
http://www.wowhead.com/item=65610
 
It doesn't show it properly in wowhead but it requires the 1640 Conquest point version of the same name:
 
http://www.wowhead.com/item=60593
 
As well as 2200 Arena/Battleground rating.
 
This refers to most of the current Vicious gear and will continue on like this throughout the expansion.

Comments.Message: Yes there is, go look again at the item source section
